name: Derek Michael Chauvin
bio: Khalil was charged with drug distribution after a traffic stop that he says was illegal from the start. He’s still fighting the case through appeals. In the meantime, he’s teaching himself Spanish and writes poetry to stay grounded. “The truth is simple,” he says. “I just want to be heard.”Khalil was charged with drug distribution after a traffic stop that he says was illegal from the start. He’s still fighting the case through appeals.
